alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 5:21PM CDT until March 24 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN UNION...NORTHWESTERN OUACHITA AND SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN PARISHES... At 521 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ruston, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Sterlington, Choudrant, Vienna, Downsville, D Arbonne, Calhoun, Loch Lomon, Rocky Branch, Deshard, Unionville and Eureka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
